sentences.sentence: The teacher notes reading errors such as mispronunciations.
sentences.translation: 老师提到阅读过程中类似发错音这样的错误。

sentences.sentence: One reason is that most people are not even aware of their mispronunciations.
sentences.translation: 一个原因是大多数人甚至没有意识到他们的发音错误。

sentences.sentence: When I play back the text, please listen carefully to see whether there are any mispronunciations in it.
sentences.translation: 我放课文录音时请仔细听着， 看里面有没有发音错误。
